name: Nick Miller
description: Nick Miller is a London-based freelance sports writer with 13 years of experience in the industry. He mainly writes about football for the Guardian and ESPN, but has also been published in FourFourTwo, Eurosport, the Independent, the Daily Telegraph and the Daily Mirror. He can also turn his hand to other sports, a particular highlight being liveblogging the luge from the Winter Games.
